queries.query:
from(bucket: "gr-bucket")
  |> range(start: -600d)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "proto4")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "batt")
  |> aggregateWindow(every: 1d, fn: mean, createEmpty: false)
  |> yield(name: "mean")

from(bucket: "gr-bucket")
  |> range(start: -5d)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "proto4")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "batt")
  |> last()

import "date"

from(bucket: "gr-bucket")
  |> range(start: -30d)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "proto4")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "batt")
  |> last()
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({r with _value: uint(v: date.truncate(t: now(), unit: 1m)) - uint(v: date.truncate(t: r._time, unit: 1m))}))
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({r with _value: string(v: duration(v: r._value))}))
